item.title: CVE-2022-4949|2024-08-03T01:55:46.127Z -- https%3A%2F%2Fadsanityplugin.com%2F -- adsanity
item.description: The AdSanity plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the 'ajax_upload' function in versions up to, and including, 1.8.1. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers with Contributor+ level privileges to upload arbitrary files on the affected sites server which makes remote code execution possible.
